titles.title: Repurposing Assets to Increase Long-term Water Availability and Yield Act

To require that certain funds provided by the Department of Transportation for high-speed rail development in the State of California that are rescinded or otherwise reimbursed be made available to the Secretary of the Interior for water storage projects, and to the Secretary of Agriculture for nitrate contamination reduction grants and new well construction grants.
Repurposing Assets to Increase Long-term Water Availability and Yield Act

bill.summary:
Repurposing Assets to Increase Long-term Water Availability and Yield Act or the RAILWAY Act
This bill redirects Department of Transportation funds previously intended for high-speed rail development in California to the Department of the Interior. Such funds shall be available for various existing water-storage and wastewater-disposal programs and new water-related grant programs.
